effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent shuffles their Active Pokémon and all attached cards into their deck.
effect.fr: Lancez une pièce. Si c'est face, votre adversaire mélange avec son deck son Pokémon Actif et toutes les cartes attachées.
effect.es: Lanza 1 moneda. Si sale cara, tu rival pone su Pokémon Activo y todas las cartas unidas a él en su baraja y las baraja todas.
effect.it: Lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, il tuo avversario rimischia il suo Pokémon attivo e tutte le carte a esso assegnate nel suo mazzo.
effect.pt: Jogue 1 moeda. Se sair cara, seu oponente embaralhará o Pokémon Ativo dele(a) e todas as cartas ligadas a ele no próprio baralho.
effect.de: Wirf 1 Münze. Bei Kopf mischt dein Gegner sein Aktives Pokémon und alle angelegten Karten in sein Deck.

description.en: It scatters cotton all over the place as a prank. If it gets wet, it'll become too heavy to move and have no choice but to answer for its mischief.
